doc:
Elvira Barney https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Elvira_Barney 0 Elvira Dolores Barney (22 January 1904 – 25 December 1936) was an English socialite, part of the London society between the world wars, who was charged with killing her lover, Michael Scott Stephen, in 1932. She was found not guilty but died four years later, alone and forgotten, in a Paris hotel room. Elvira_Dolores_Barney ( 22_January_1904 – 25_December_1936 ) was an_English_socialite , part of the_London_society between the_world_wars , who was_charged with killing her_lover , Michael_Scott_Stephen , in 1932 . She was_found not_guilty but died four_years later , alone and forgotten , in a_Paris_hotel_room .
